title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1552.8 - Denial of request for a record or for amendment or correction of a record or personal information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1552.8 - Denial of request for a record or for amendment or correction of a record or personal information

State Regulations
(a) Denial
of a request for records or for amendment or correction of a record or personal
information shall be in writing, explaining the reasons therefor, and shall
identify the person to whom an appeal may be directed. (b) A failure to grant or deny access to
records or to respond to a request for amendment or correction of a record
within the time periods specified in sections
1552.6
and
1552.7
of this Part shall be
construed as a denial which may be appealed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1552.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
